terms.description: The protagonist of the story, who is on a journey to cultivate and gain power. He is known for his determination and innovative cultivation techniques.
A cultivator who practices dual-cultivation techniques, including the Typhoon Formula and Wind Escape Technique. She is a close ally of Mo Wuji.
A powerful cultivation technique that Cen Shuyin practices, which enhances her wind elemental abilities.
A technique that allows the user to move with the wind, leaving no trace. Mo Wuji gains insights into this technique, making it unique to him.
A wind-type treasure that Mo Wuji uses to gain enlightenment on the Wind Escape Technique. It is a rare and valuable item.
A level in cultivation that Mo Wuji and Cen Shuyin have reached, indicating a significant advancement in their powers.
A dangerous location known for its violent winds and wind-type beasts. It serves as a training ground for Mo Wuji to hone his Wind Escape Technique.
Wind-type beasts that inhabit the Thorny Wind Gate, posing a threat to cultivators like Mo Wuji and Cen Shuyin.
A continent mentioned in the story, known for having rare communication beads forged by Worldly Immortal smiths.
A high-level cultivator with the ability to forge rare items like communication beads. They possess a deep understanding of the space dao.
A rare item used for communication, forged by Worldly Immortal smiths. It is highly sought after in the cultivation world.
A cultivation method used by Mo Wuji to absorb energy and gain insights into the Wind Dao.
A reservoir of elemental energy within a cultivator's body, indicating their power level. Cen Shuyin has both wind and ice elemental energy lakes.
An initial stage in cultivation that Cen Shuyin advances from while practicing the Typhoon Formula.
A stage in cultivation that follows Channel Opening, which Cen Shuyin reaches with the Typhoon Formula.
A stage in cultivation that Cen Shuyin achieves, marking her progress in the Typhoon Formula.
A cultivation stage that Cen Shuyin reaches, indicating her advancement in the Typhoon Formula.
A stage in cultivation that is part of the Human Realm, which cultivators strive to surpass.
A stage in cultivation where spirit channels are opened and expanded, crucial for cultivators with spiritual roots.
Pathways within a cultivator's body that allow the flow of spiritual energy, essential for cultivation.
